body:
I was just gone on vacation for a week. I didn't make any notice, or hint, or anything. I was trying to see how viable leaving threads are.

So, if you guys were wondering were I was, then leaving threads DO have a reason.

But if you just shrugged it off, or didn't care, then leaving threads are just clutter.

So, which kind of person were you?
